projects.title: Shoe Store Management System
projects.description: A robust web-based system designed to streamline the operations of a shoe-selling company with over 30 branches. The platform manages inventory, orders, shippings and accountability.

projects.title: Gym Management System
projects.description: Includes features like attendance control, memberships management, sales reports, and staff coordination, this app serves as a powerful tool for managing day-to-day gym activities.

projects.title: Restaurant Management System
projects.description: With features such as customizable meal options, promotions management, and order history, this app ensures a convenient and efficient way to manage the restaurant.

projects.title: Las Marías | Planificación Urbana
projects.description: Provides essential information about available land slots for housing development. It’s designed for users to easily explore the project and understand how to visit the site.

projects.title: Mining Vendors Registration Portal
projects.description: A dedicated web platform that enables vendors of mining companies to register their businesses with the government of Jujuy, Argentina.

projects.title: Efficient Interval Training App
projects.description: A specialized app designed for Tabata and high-intensity interval training (HIIT) workouts. This intuitive timer helps users customize their workout sessions with adjustable intervals for work and rest periods.
